attributes.action: Ensure the US assistes fully in all investigations in to "friendly fire" incidents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the latest news that yet again the US is witholding information and stopping witnesses attending investigations into the killing of British servicemen by US troops the government should withdraw immediatley from all countries where action is taking place alongside US troops.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
